title: Content Removed
body:
Hi Riot.

Is there any way we can get more clarity on what content was removed when we get the automated message from you guys?

It was the first time some of ny content has been removed due to the "don't be a jerk" rule. However i have no idea what was removed. If i knew what was removed i would be able to avoid it in the future.

Looking forward to a helpful responce.

replies.body:
So now the mods are targeting actual shitposters instead of being xenophobic towards me for no reason.

Nice job mods, keep up the good work.

> [{quoted}](name=Lajneen,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9veEHMw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-03T08:45:15.120+0000)
>
> So now the mods are targeting actual shitposters instead of being xenophobic towards me for no reason.
> 
> Nice job mods, keep up the good work.

you're still the number one target if they're targeting shitposters.
That doesn't make any sense since I'm not a shitposter.

> [{quoted}](name=Lajneen,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9veEHMw,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T04:24:04.585+0000)
>
> That doesn't make any sense since I'm not a shitposter.

yeah, and neither am I.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9veEHMw,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T04:55:37.024+0000)
>
> yeah, and neither am I.

Your other account get forum banned or something?

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9veEHMw,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T23:20:18.699+0000)
>
> Your other account get forum banned or something?

my main got permad on oce and NA, transferred one smurf to the japan server and my other account doesn't work on forums for whatever reason.
was a mod that did it, but absolutely everything got deleted, even if there wasnt a problem with it
Mystery Mod tried this once. People complained.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9veEHMw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-03T09:56:49.073+0000)
>
> Mystery Mod tried this once. People complained.

Fair enough. Must have missed it.
Don't know how you missed it. It was a big situation at the time and was actually the thing that made me leave for these past couple months.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9veEHMw,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T00:32:45.052+0000)
>
> Don't know how you missed it. It was a big situation at the time and was actually the thing that made me leave for these past couple months.

Just didnt pay enough attention i guess.
